name: American Airlines 777 First Class, Chicago O'Hare to Dallas Fort Worth
description:
A beautiful evening flight from AA's Midwest Hub at O'Hare down to Dallas Fort Worth. This particular rotation uses a Boeing 777-200.

The 777-200s are in the process of being converted from having an International First Class cabin to having the new business class product. However, there are still a few knocking about with the old style First seats. 

This cabin was definitely in need of ripping out, but you can't beat a huge armchair, personal TV and personal office on a two-hour flight! Enjoy the video - a bit of a trip back in time...

Subscribe and comment guys!

You can also follow me on:

Twitter, @pauls_trips

Snapchat: pauls_trips
